sentences.cn: 一轮马拉松式的持久谈判

sentences.en: A marathon runner counterbalances lack of speed with endurance.
sentences.cn: 马拉松跑者用耐力来弥补速度的不足.

sentences.en: A new world marathon record of 2 hrs, 8 min, 5 sec, was set by Stephen Jones of Great Britain.
sentences.cn: 英国的斯蒂芬·琼斯创造了新的马拉松世界纪录——2小时8分零5秒。

sentences.en: A thirty-nine-year-old competitor collapsed half-way through the marathon and died shortly afterwards.
sentences.cn: 一名39岁的马拉松参赛者跑到一半时瘫倒在地，没过多久就死了。

sentences.en: After running in the marathon, she was flat out for a week.
sentences.cn: 她参加马拉松比赛后一星期都疲惫不堪.

sentences.en: Garcia ran the marathon in just under three hours.
sentences.cn: 加西亚用了不到三小时就跑完了马拉松。

sentences.en: He can hardly run a mile, much less the marathon.
sentences.cn: 他连一哩都跑不了, 更不用说马拉松了.

sentences.en: It takes a lot of stamina to run a marathon.
sentences.cn: 跑马拉松需要很大的耐力。

sentences.en: More than 2000 years ago at Marathon, the Greeks won a victory.
sentences.cn: 在约在2000年以前,居住在马拉松的希腊人获得了胜利.

sentences.en: People lined the streets to watch marathon.
sentences.cn: 人们夹道观看马拉松赛跑.

sentences.en: People make marathon journeys to buy glass here.
sentences.cn: 人们千里迢迢赶到这里购买玻璃。

sentences.en: Rodgers can also claim four victories in the New York Marathon.
sentences.cn: 罗杰斯也能在纽约马拉松比赛中4次夺冠。

sentences.en: The meeting was a bit of a marathon.
sentences.cn: 这次会议有点马拉松赛的味道.

sentences.en: This expedition made a landing near Marathon in Attica.
sentences.cn: 这个远征队在阿提卡的马拉松附近登陆.

sentences.en: Two of the runners in the Marathon race collapsed and were carried off in a state of prostration.
sentences.cn: 两位马拉松赛跑选手累倒了,他们在虚脱状态中被抬走.

sentences.en: Why did you drop out in the middle of the marathon?
sentences.cn: 为什么你在马拉松赛跑途中退出?

trans.tran_en: a marathon event continues for a long time and needs a lot of energy, patience, or determination
a long race of about 26 miles or 42 kilometres
